name: Tom
description: A Fitness Trainer, or Fitness Instructor, provides fitness guidance to help clients improve their physical condition.

name: Natasha
description: You will assess the physical and health conditions of clients, create appropriate exercise plans, and monitor their improvement.

name: Russel
description: You will maximize the quality of life and movement potential within.Monitor their improvement.It is important to have a trainer.

name: Mark
description: Evaluate clients’ fitness levels and health conditions.Explain exercises in detail and suggest alternatives if needed.Monitor progress of clients’ fitness levels.

name: Ema
description: Explain safe and proper use of gym equipment.Lead both individual and group training sessions.Research on new exercise technique.

name: John
description: Promote the gym’s fitness packages and plans.Perform CPR and administer first aid in case of emergencies.The awesome body building you should achieve.
